mapper.select: select rownum, a.* from openforum a order by rownum desc
mapper.update: update openforum set views = views + 1 where ono = #{ono}
mapper.select: SELECT * from(select ono, oname, oregdate, LAG(ono) OVER (ORDER BY ono) prevno, LAG(oname) OVER (ORDER BY ono) prevname, LAG(oregdate) OVER (ORDER BY ono) prevdate FROM openforum ORDER BY ono) where ono = #{ono}

SELECT * from(select ono, oname, oregdate, LEAD(ono) OVER (ORDER BY ono) nextno, LEAD(oname) OVER (ORDER BY ono) nextname, LEAD(oregdate) OVER (ORDER BY ono) nextdate FROM openforum ORDER BY ono) where ono = #{ono}
